name: Marble Miner
description:
Smash blocks, collect gems.

Move the mouse to move the green paddle horizontally. Click to launch the ball, then move to bounce the ball up and break bricks. Knock gems out of bricks and collect them with the paddle. Collect all gems to earn extra paddles. Break all bricks to advance to the next level.

Click outside the game viewport to pause.

Source: https://github.com/IoriBranford/marble-miner
